text: Dinu Popescu is a retired water polo player from Romania. Popescu competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born on 27 June 1949.Dinu Popescu == References == Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian water polo players Category:Olympians for Romania Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest
title: Dinu Popescu
